review: I am so happy I bought this. It works perfectly, exactly as advertised. I do not have an HD tv, but there is an HDMI port. I used to plug the HDMI cable from my laptop to the tv, and have to use the mouse to navigate. Slow and not user friendly. This firestick is fast and all shows are easy to find, the remote is so nice to have. I do not subscribe to any tv cable service, so this is perfect for Netlix, Hulu, Amazon Prime etc subscribers who just want to watch random shows and movies.
